wikipedia_page.main:
Albert Nightingale (10 November 1923 – 27 February 2006) was a professional footballer who played as a striker for Sheffield United, Huddersfield Town, Blackburn Rovers and Leeds United.
He died in 2006, aged 82.

response: Furniss started his career with Hallam, and was given his chance to play for United in Wartime (1941), along with Albert Nightingale, in a 3–3 draw against Everton at Goodison Park during an air-raid.
